title: Cant spectate?
body:
Hello, for some reason  I cannot spectate games :(.   I select someone to spectate and game loads but the screen just goes black and never loads. 

thanks in advance!

replies.body: Hmmmmm your client might be having a hard time loading the game in progress since it needs to catch up with where the match currently is. Try turning on the option in the client settings called "close client during game" and let me know if those spectated matches load any better!
Ill give that a shot when I get home from work tomorrow, thanks for the quick response!

Give it a go, and let me know!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
